channel.title: spatial data analysis on Jakob Schwalb-Willmann
channel.description: Recent content in spatial data analysis on Jakob Schwalb-Willmann

item.title: Learn how to analyze spatial data from the ground up with this newly published book
item.description: If you have no prior knowledge in spatial data analysis, ‘An Introduction to Spatial Data Analysis’ might be the book for you to start with! Spatial data – what does that even mean? That’s a good question and one can become quite philosophical about its answer. If you are perfectly aware of what spatial data are you might just skip the next three paragraphs (or if you are in a hurry and have no time for lengthy introductions).
